code: import L from'leaflet';import{ICON_MAP}from'./constants';export const getIconForMarca=marca=>{return ICON_MAP[marca]||'default.jpg';};export const createCustomIcon=function(marca){let publicUrl=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:process.env.PUBLIC_URL;const iconUrl=getIconForMarca(marca);return L.icon({iconUrl:"".concat(publicUrl,"/iconos/").concat(iconUrl),iconSize:[30,30],iconAnchor:[15,30],popupAnchor:[0,-30],shadowUrl:require('leaflet/dist/images/marker-shadow.png'),shadowSize:[41,41],shadowAnchor:[13,41]});};export const createBrandLogo=function(marca){let publicUrl=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:process.env.PUBLIC_URL;const iconUrl=getIconForMarca(marca);return"".concat(publicUrl,"/iconos/").concat(iconUrl);};
